original_text: Judas Iscariot was one of Jesus' 12 apostles. He went to see the leaders of the priests 15 and he asked them, ‘How much money will you give me if I help you to take hold of Jesus?’ The priests gave Judas 30 silver coins.
korean_text: 그 때에 열둘 중의 하나인 가룟 유다라 하는 자가 대제사장들에게 가서 말하되

sentences.original_text: Judas Iscariot was one of Jesus' 12 apostles.
sentences.korean_translation: 가리옷 유다는 예수님의 12 사도 중 한 사람이었습니다.

sentences.original_text: He went to see the leaders of the priests
How much money will you give me
if I help you to take hold of Jesus?
sentences.korean_translation: 만약 내가 예수님을 잡는 것을 돕는다면?

sentences.original_text: The priests gave Judas 30 silver coins.
